Qieyun: 匣開二麻上?, 匣開二麻去?
English: down; beneath; inferior; to come down; to take off

Qieyun: 匣開一侯上?, 匣開一侯去?

English: to look at; to regard; to care for. but; still; yet.
to go in; to put in
to tell; to announce; to lay a plaint
to stand up; to fix; to establish immediately.
thereupon; a consequential particle; now; so; however; but

Qieyun: 書開三宵上?, 書開三宵去?
莊開三之去?, 崇開三之去?
